description:
KHACKACKACK!  COUGH!  KUGH!  It`s Christmas Eve...
What a time to be sick...KHACKACKACK!
Futaba is expecing Santa Claus (me) to come tonight...!
But I can`t...give Futaba her present...when I`m so sick...!
What do I do...?  I know...I got something nice for you, Hitoha...
That...that bag...
...There`s a Santa suit inside.  It`s all...up to you...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 変人はサンタクロース
